mdRecord.dcterms:title: Dannemarie / Groupe de canevas de tir
XIII. Dannemarie
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: France. Armée. Groupe de canevas de tir.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 69 x 102 cm. on sheet 74 x 108 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Mis à jour le d'après les levés executés par la Brigade topogrque. d'Armée 25 Avril 1918"
Relief shown by contours and spot heights.
Military fronts overprinted in red on a topographic base. "Secret No." (in red) followed by "76" (in black) printed in upper margin.
Covers part of the Haute-Rhin Départ. of France, with Dannemarie and Gommersdorff on the eastern edge.
"A ne pas emporter en 1re. ligne" -- In red in lower margin.
"C.6.5. T.8.5." printed in lower right margin.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: From the Joseph P. Ast World War I papers, MSS 13905-a. Pencilled on back: "3 (secret) maps. Dannamarie # 75-76, 275."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Ast, Joseph Phillip, 1882-1975--Library--Personal copy.
World War, 1914-1918--France--Maps.
Haut-Rhin (France)--Maps.
Dannemarie (France)--Maps.
